definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: It's such a great film. The director took a lot of care while filming.
sentences.chinese: 电影很不错，导演拍的时候很用心。

sentences.english: Anderson has the attitude for comedy, but not the aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 导演有对于喜剧片的态度，但是也许并不正确。

sentences.english: Here, please allow me to send my gratitude to Madam Wang Liping and director Mr. Xia Xiaoyun.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，我要感谢王丽萍女士和夏晓昀导演。

sentences.english: This part try to find the Tornatore's habits of direction and personal characteristics from the video shoot.
sentences.chinese: 从短片中找寻托纳托雷的拍摄习惯和个人导演特色。

sentences.english: Hopefully he’ll bring the Planet of the Apes series back to life.
sentences.chinese: 希望导演能让《人猿星球》系列重获新生。

sentences.english: There are many meaningful long scenes in this director's films.
sentences.chinese: 这位导演的影片中有很多意味深长的长镜头。

sentences.english: Assistant directors often have to direct the extras in the background.
sentences.chinese: 助理导演总是得指挥背景里的群众演员。

sentences.english: From award winning Hong Kong directors Alan Mak and Andrew Lau.
sentences.chinese: 出自于得过奖的香港导演麦兆辉与刘伟强。

sentences.english: Making short-films, for directors, is an excellent practice.
sentences.chinese: 短片对于一个导演来说，是一个非常好的锻炼。
福斯导演了五部故事片。

sentences.english: Such is the talent of the director.
sentences.chinese: 这就是导演才华洋溢的地方。

sentences.english: One of its foremost proponents is the country's most bankable director, Feng Xiaogang.
sentences.chinese: 其中最著名的拥护者是在中国最卖座的导演冯小刚。

sentences.english: Yahoo Shopping is the best place to comparison shop de, director of small piezoelectric alarms.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎购物是最好的地方比较小商店棣导演压电警报器。
你是说陈可辛导演和甄子丹吗？

sentences.english: The director cleverly atmosphered the film for added chills.
sentences.chinese: 导演手法巧妙地着意渲染使电影更增添恐怖气氛。

sentences.english: So, director need to make her moves alot.
sentences.chinese: 所以，导演必须让她动作很多。

definition: to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
Wong Kar-wai (1956-), Hong Kong film director
cast and crew/performers and production team
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
